targets.query: SELECT mean(/cpu_temp\d+/) FROM "pan_system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(linear)
SELECT mean(/fan\d+/) FROM "pan_system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(linear)

panels.description: Connections Per Seconds by Security Zone.

targets.query: SELECT last("panZoneActiveTcpCps") FROM "4weeks"."panZoneTable" WHERE ("zone" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

panels.title: CPS by SecurityZone

panels.description: Connections Per Seconds by Protocol for each security zone.

targets.query: SELECT last("panZoneActiveTcpCps") FROM "4weeks"."panZoneTable" WHERE ("zone" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT last("panZoneActiveTcpCps") FROM "4weeks"."panZoneTable" WHERE ("zone" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

targets.query: SELECT last("hrStorageUsed")/last("hrStorageSize") FROM "pan_buffers" WHERE ("hrStorageIndex" =~ /\d\d\d\d/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hrStorageDescr" fill(linear)
